package.name: Java Runtime Environment 16
package.shortDescription: Run headless Java applications directly on your iDevice

descriptionlist.description: This program allows you to install the full JRE 16 onto your iDevice.
No options to configure, just run /usr/lib/jvm/java-16-openjdk/bin/java in a terminal.

This was ported by openjdk and ProcursusTeam, although this release is slightly modified for use on non-Procursus jailbreaks. If you are using Chimera, Odyssey/Odysseyra1n, or Taurine, you should install the official package from Procursus (as it supports more features).

changelog.change: JDK-8253816: Switch to Exec W^X mode after JNI DetachCurrentThread (#10)
